entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:22 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 04:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -17.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -19.4°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight then 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight then becoming light before morning. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:46 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
